headline: Evercore singles out 8 AI stocks with resilient business models
summary: Investing.com -- The recent selloff in companies with high exposure to artificial intelligence has been “indiscriminate,” creating openings for investors to identify businesses with durable strategies as AI adoption accelerates, Evercore ISI analysts told investors in a note Monday.

content.title: Evercore singles out 8 AI stocks with resilient business models
